## MarkExtension.type property

Set's the type of this extension to be a `Mark`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly type: ExtensionType.Mark;
```

## Remarks

This value is used by the predicates to check whether this is a mark / node or plain extension.
